rename.to: feature request: keyboard shortcut for approval button

issue.title: Improvement Idea for doccano

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
**Please read this issue when you want to add the feature to doccano**  
**Please upvote üëç related issue that let us judge priority .**

We show üëç if someone upvote, and ü§© means over 10 vote

## Toward More Practical Annotation Tool

### Annotation

* Display
  - [ ] : Support HTML syntax in Document #35 üëç
* Filter
  - [ ] : Arrange Annotation Status and Filter by it #280 üëç
* Label
  - [ ] : Provide for setting the order of labels #816
  - [ ] : Group labels by the same color #477
  - [ ] : Support multiple kinds of label set #5 üëç
  - [x] : Display shortkey in labels selector (on Annotation page) #834
* Annotation
  - [x] : keyboard shortcut for approval button #718 üëç
  - [x] : A button to clear the markup. #631
  - [ ] : Automatically select the sequential characters in the sequence labeling task by the hover. #666
  - [ ] : Show context when annotation. #466 
* Navigation
  - [x] : Redirect to the specific page by id, not by offset. #540 üëç
  - [x] : "First" and "Last" buttons #615
* Productivity
  - [ ] : Display the who annotated the document #881
  - [x] : Support Comments when Annotating #1050
  - [ ] : Enable Stats view for non-admins #270 üëç
* Portability
  - [ ] : Project export and import #901

### Dataset

* Import/Export
  - [x] : Convert label to label-ID when exporting #295 ü§©
  - [x] : Import the exported annotation data and keep the all original info #482
  - [x] : Support JSON format (not JSONL) #454 üëç
  - [x] : Make maximum file upload (import) size configurable #708 üëç
* Management
  - [x] : Bulk Delete #523

## Toward Advanced Annotation Tool

### Task

- [ ] : Question Answering dataset #81 ü§©
- [ ] : Multiple choice question #464
- [x] : Multiple label in sequence labeling #19 ü§©
- [x] : Nested Named Entity Recognition #544 üëç
- [x] : Relation Annotation #233 üëç

### Auto-Annotation

- [ ] : Implements labeling functions (Weak Supervision) #224 ü§©
- [x] : Add Auto-labeling #191

## Toward Production Usage

* Deployment
  - [ ] : Helm chart #701 üëç
  - [x] : Support doccano v1.x on Heroku #811
* Security
  - [ ] :  [Proposal] Warn and/or fail if default admin's password hasn't been changed #857
  - [x] : Clarify how to set user own username/password in docker-compose for security #748
* Authentication
  - [ ] : Two factor authentication for admin and annotators #756
  - [ ] : Okta OIDC social login is not available #1255 üëç
  - [ ] : Google OAuth support #620 üëç
  - [ ] : LDAP-Support #560 üëç
* Annotation Workflow
  - [x] : Allow user to change another users' annotation #531 üëç
* Annotator Management
  - [ ] : Allow to assign more than one role in a project. #537
  - [ ] : Enhance Statistics: Compare Annotators #114 üëç
* Accessibility
  - [x] : Multiple language interface #479

issue.title: Adding keyboard shortcut for approval button

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
Addressing issue #718

When user presses the ‚Äòa‚Äô key, the document toggles from ‚Äòapproved‚Äô to ‚Äònot approved‚Äô or vice versa. The user is advanced to the next item in the queue once the key is pressed.

body:
@Hironsan 
This does not work anymore since the last update (at least for me). I found the "enter" solution to work great. 
Assuming this was removed by accident,  would it be possible to add this functionality again?

Thanks!

issue.title: Add keyboard shortcut back to accept button

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body: It seems like the "enter" key keyboard shortcut for the accept/review button functionality was lost at some point. See discussion in  #718 and issue #1398. This pull request restores the functionality

body:
I think it would be nice to have one key (perhaps enter) that marks the item as checked and at the same time moves to the next item.

(My use case is binary classification, which could be done with a single key press; but as I see it, I currently need 3 key presses in doccano: For selecting the label, for approving, and for moving to the next item. ‚Äì Would be nice to cut that down to 2 key presses, or even one.)

Thansk for consideration!

I implemented (a probably pretty quick and dirty) solution for ImageClassification which automatically marks the image as accepted and opens the next page after assigning a label. Having to press 3 buttons (hotkey for label, enter to accept, right arrow for next) when only one is required is ridiculous when labeling about 1000 pictures. 

https://github.com/hermlon/doccano/tree/feature/auto-advance

In case the marking accepted part isn't too important, I just found out the doccano upstream currently behaves in a similar way when selecting the filter "Undone" in the annotation toolbar. Then it will skip to the next image automatically after selecting the label (without marking the image as accepted however).
